snippet: Egyptian authorities on Thursday released two Coptic Christian boys detained after they were accused of urinating on a Koran, but they will remain under investigation.
abstract: Egyptian authorities release two Coptic Christian boys detained after they were accused of urinating on a Koran, but they will remain under investigation.
lead_paragraph: Egyptian authorities on Thursday released two Coptic Christian boys detained after they were accused of urinating on a Koran, but they will remain under investigation.

headline.main: Egypt: 2 Coptic Boys Freed for Now
headline.print_headline: Egypt: 2 Coptic Boys Freed for Now
